business.headline: 'Gold is money': Zoho's Sridhar Vembu backs yellow metal as prices cross Rs 1 lakhOn Monday, gold June futures on the MCX hit a new high of Rs 99,178 per 10 grams, up nearly Rs 1,900 from the previous close. In the physical market, gold traded at Rs 97,200 per 10 grams (excluding GST), taking the final retail price past Rs 1 lakh after adding 3% GST.
Sensex closes 187 points higher, Nifty above 24,100; IndusInd bank down 5%Sensex closes 187 points higher, Nifty above 24,100; IndusInd bank down 5%

Gold prices jump to $3,500 amid Trump vs Powell dramaPrices of gold, traditionally seen as a safe-haven asset amid economic and geopolitical uncertainty, have risen by nearly a third so far this year.

Walmart-backed Flipkart to return to India ahead of much-awaited IPOFlipkart has grown into a large e-commerce platform that competes directly with Amazon in the market and is planning a public listing.
Gold prices are booming, but Dubai's iconic Gold Souk is losing its sparkleThere are signs of change amid rising prices for gold, as buyers look to diamonds and lighter gold jewellery, instead.

Vivad Se Vishwas Scheme ends on April 30. Resolve your income tax disputes nowThe Vivad Se Vishwas Scheme is all about reducing pending tax cases and giving taxpayers a chance to settle things amicably.

East or West, gold is the bestThe sharp rise in gold prices comes at a time when global markets are under pressure due to the falling US dollar and rising uncertainty in the US economy, especially after recent statements by Donald Trump.

China's gold ATM melts jewellery and sends money in 30 minutes. Check here The gold ATM, which is set up in China's Shanghai, melts gold, checks its purity and weight, and transfers the value to your bank account.

Amazon, Walmart's Flipkart may gain from US push in India trade deal: ReportIndia currently imposes restrictions on foreign-owned online retailers, including bans on holding inventory and selling directly to consumers. Domestic players like Reliance, by contrast, face no such constraints, giving them an edge in both online and offline retail.

Air India eyes Boeing jets rejected by China amid trade tensions: ReportThe Tata Group-owned carrier, which is undergoing a fleet overhaul and rapid expansion, is in talks with Boeing Co. to acquire several planes that were being readied for Chinese carriers before fresh tariffs disrupted their delivery.

Is the Rs 500 note in your wallet real or fake? Look out for this small typoThe Ministry of Home Affairs has flagged a surge in fake Rs 500 notes that are so well-made, even experienced handlers are finding it hard to detect them.

Gensol Engineering may face ED probe for money laundering chargesThe latest development comes at a time when Sebi uncovered a fraud at Gensol Engineering and questions are being raised about the company's financial practices.

Gold touches Rs 1 lakh: 5 things you must knowGold June futures on the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) hit a record Rs 99,178 per 10 grams on Monday. In the physical market, gold was priced at Rs 97,200 per 10 grams.

RBI allows minors above 10 to operate bank accounts. Check detailsBanks have been given the flexibility to set the rules for these accounts based on their own risk management policies. This includes setting limits on the amount of money that can be kept in such accounts and deciding on the terms and conditions.

Uday Kotak calls Indian housewife 'smartest fund manager' as gold hits Rs 1 lakhUday Kotak praises Indian housewives for their unwavering faith in gold, noting how their instinctive investment strategies have outperformed global financial approaches.

Gold hits Rs 1 lakh milestone: What's driving the rally and should you buy?The surge in gold prices comes amid mounting global uncertainty, fuelled by fresh tensions between President Donald Trump and the US Federal Reserve over rate cuts, and an escalating trade war with China.

Why Sensex, Nifty are gaining despite crash on Wall StreetBenchmark indices on Dalal Street opened higher despite Wall Street's overnight plunge. Is this the latest sign that Indian markets are trying to decouple from the US market's volatility?
Sensex, Nifty turn positive after early fall; IndusInd bank down 3%The S&P BSE Sensex added 129.12 points to 79,537.62, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 43.85 points to 24,169.40 as of 9:36 am.

Gold's record rally continues as Trump's Fed chief criticism sinks Wall StreetTrump reiterated his call for an immediate reduction in interest rates on Monday, warning that the US economy could face a slowdown, while criticising Powell's stance to keep rates unchanged until clarity on the inflation impact of Trump's tariff plans.

Stock market opening today: Sensex, Nifty to open flat after Wall Street crash?While Sensex and Nifty ended the previous session at their highest levels since January 6, the sharp fall in US markets overnight may cap gains during early trade on Tuesday.

Stocks to watch on April 22: HUL, HCLTech, Coal India, Paytm, Mazagaon DockShares of HCLTech, Waaree Energies, and Tata Communications will be in focus as they are set to announce their quarterly results today.

Dow Jones tumbles nearly 1,000 points as US stock markets crashTrump on Monday repeated his criticism of Fed Chair Jerome Powell and said the US economy could slow down unless interest rates are lowered immediately.

Former Fortis promoter Shivinder Singh files personal insolvency: ReportSingh has invoked Section 94 of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code (IBC), which allows individuals to file for insolvency if they are unable to repay debts. In his plea, Singh stated that his liabilities now exceed the value of his remaining assets.
Sensex, Nifty rise over 1% in fifth-day rally led by banking, IT gainsThe S&P BSE Sensex added 855.30 points to close at 79,408.50, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 273.90 points to end at 24,125.55.

Klaus Schwab steps down as World Economic Forum chairThe WEF thanked Schwab for his 55 years of dedicated leadership and for building what has become a premier global platform for dialogue and progress.

India hopes to seal US trade pact this year: Finance Minister Nirmala SitharamanNirmala Sitharaman is on a five-day trip to the United States, where she will attend the spring meetings of the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank, and the meeting of G20 finance ministers and central bank governors.

HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank hit record highs after strong Q4: Buy, hold or sell?HDFC Bank rose 1.3% while ICICI Bank gained 0.9% by 9:40 am. Their gains helped lift the Nifty Bank and Nifty Private Bank indices by nearly 2%, and pushed the Nifty 50 up 0.6%, with heavyweight HDFC Bank emerging as the index's top driver.

Sensex soars 1,000 points: Why is stock market rising today?Stock market today: The rally on Monday marks the fifth straight session of gains, showing that investor confidence is returning. Both Sensex and Nifty touched their highest levels since January 6.

Explained: Why Yes Bank share price rose nearly 7% todayThe Yes Bank stock was trading at Rs 18.95 on the BSE, marking a 4.75% jump. Gains continued through the morning, with the stock touching an intraday high of Rs 19.37, indicating that it rallied nearly 7%.

Stock market rally: Should investors consider small-cap, mid-cap stocks?With strong institutional inflows and improved breadth in the market, analysts say the coming weeks could favour investors who are selectively increasing exposure to quality names in the midcap and smallcap universe.

Gold price nears Rs 1 lakh-mark amid global uncertainty. Should you buy or sell?Gold price today: Monday's jump follows a dip in the previous session, where MCX Gold fell 0.44% to Rs 95,239 due to profit booking. But the broader narrative remains dominated by geopolitical and macroeconomic anxiety.

'Era of salaryman is over': Saurabh Mukherjea warns India's middle classSpeaking on a recent podcast titled Beyond the Paycheck: India's Entrepreneurial Rebirth, Saurabh Mukherjea issued a clear and unsettling warning: salaried employment, long considered the golden path to financial security, is dying.
Sensex, Nifty rally as strong Q4 results from banks lift market confidenceThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 635.70 points to 79,188.90, while the NSE Nifty50 added 200.30 points to 24,051.95 as of 10:33 am.

Stock market opening today: Will Sensex, Nifty continue their winning rally?Sensex, Nifty today: While strong results from HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank may help, weak global cues and disappointing Q4 results from Infosys could hold back gains.

Stocks to watch on April 21: TCS, Infosys, Gensol Engineering, HDFC Bank, IndigoShares of several major companies such as TCS, Inofsys, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, BHEL, Gensol Engineering, IndiGo, among others, will be in focus on April 21.

Gensol faces government inquiry after Rs 975 crore EV loan misuse: SourcesAccording to sources, the MCA's move is an independent action aimed at investigating potential corporate governance lapses and financial irregularities. There is no fixed timeline for the inquiry.

India-US trade talks from April 23, tariffs, customs negotiations on agenda: ReportThe Indian official team is visiting the US to give further impetus to the negotiations in the 90-day tariff pause window and discuss these terms of reference to iron out differences on certain issues.

Ford pauses shipments of SUVs, sports cars and other models to ChinaFord has halted exports of key US-built vehicles to China amid rising tariffs and trade tensions, impacting a once-profitable segment of its business, WSJ reports. Engine shipments, however, continue.
No GST on UPI transactions over Rs 2,000, government clarifiesUPI payments, especially those made to merchants, currently don't attract any extra charges like GST.

ICICI Bank cuts FD and savings rates. Check what's newIf you have a savings account with ICICI Bank, you'll now earn slightly less. For balances below Rs 50 lakh, the new interest rate is 2.75% per annum, down from 3%.

entertainment.headline: Mohanlal's Thudarum is a family drama, not a thriller like Drishyam, says directorWith audience speculation growing around the genre of Mohanlal's upcoming film 'Thudarum', Director Tharun Moorthy, recently stated that the film is a grounded family drama, countering interpretations that it might be a crime thriller following comparisons to 'Drishyam'.

Ram Charan's Peddi is a mix of real and fictional tales, says director Buchi BabuDirector Buchi Babu Sana revealed that 'Peddi', starring Ram Charan, is inspired by real-life incidents set in a village with rooted emotions. He confirmed that Charan approved the script in a single sitting, marking the start of their collaboration.

No Godzilla, no naagin, Kartik Aaryan turns Naagzilla in new filmDharma Productions and Mahaveer Jain Films team up for 'Naagzilla', featuring Kartik Aaryan in a fantasy comedy role. The film, set to release on Nag Panchami 2026, promises a unique storyline.

Priyanka Chopra, Megan Thee Stallion to be awarded at Gold House GalaPriyanka Chopra, who is currently working on SS Rajamouli's magnum opus starring Mahesh Babu, tentatively titled SSMB29, will be honoured with the inaugural Global Vanguard Honour in Los Angeles.  Megan Thee Stallion and several others are expected to be awarded that night.

Dhai Kilo Ka Haath and handpumps: Sunny Deol punches age in the face at 67Bollywood's OG Sunny Deol is back with another banger, 'Jaat'. In an era where action stunts are more about green screens than grit, Deol storms in at 67 with 'Jaat', reminding everyone what real action looks like.

Priyanka Setia: Hurts when influencers are cast based on social media numbersPriyanka Setia shares her mixed emotions about her new release 'Khauf', addressing the challenges of competing with influencers in Bollywood. She reflects on her journey from an air hostess to an actress, and her aspirations for diverse roles.

Anurag Kashyap apologises to Brahmin community: Forgot dignity due to angerFilmmaker Anurag Kashyap has apologised to the Brahmin community after making controversial remarks. He expressed regret, acknowledging the inappropriateness of his comments.

Aamir Khan's big plans for Mahabharat: Might need multiple filmmakersDuring a recent interview, Bollywood superstar Aamir Khan revealed that he hopes to start working on his dream project, 'The Mahabharat', this year.

Ananya Panday's cousin Ahaan to debut with Saiyaara, release set for July 2025Yash Raj Films is set to release 'Saiyaara', a romantic drama marking Ahaan Panday's entry into Bollywood, on July 18, 2025. The film will be directed by Mohit Suri.

Mahesh Manjrekar bats for Astitva re-release: It doesn't age, it's still topicalVeteran filmmaker Mahesh Manjrekar sees the re-release trend as a chance to showcase 'Astitva' again. Despite 'Vaastav's' anniversary, he believes 'Astitva' holds timeless relevance.

Parineeti Chopra reacts to fans calling Raghav Chadha 'jiju' at IPL match. WatchActor Parineeti Chopra reacted to a video of fans chanting 'jiju' after Raghav Chadha attended the RCB vs PBKS IPL match in Chandigarh.

Singer Sonu Nigam warns of fake accounts on X, asks followers to report and blockSinger Sonu Nigam requested his followers to be beware of fake accounts under his name. Stating that he has been inactive on X for eight years, he asked his fans to report and block such accounts.
Rohit Shetty addresses rift with SRK after Dilwale: We have mutual respectFilmmaker Rohit Shetty broke his silence on his alleged rift with Shah Rukh Khan. The director

Actor Vishnu Vishal, badminton player Jwala Gutta welcome baby girlTamil actor Vishnu Vishal and badminton player Jwala Gutta became parents to a baby girl recently. The actor announced the happy news on social media.

Preity Zinta all smiles as Virat Kohli shows Vamika, Akaay's pics after IPL matchThe RCB vs PBKS match on April 20 turned memorable after a viral video featured fun banter between Virat Kohli and Preity Zinta.

Kanye West admits incestuous relationship with cousin: Showed him dirty magazinesKanye West opened up about having a sexual encounter with a male cousin, who is now in prison. He shared his music video, Cousins, on X along with his story.

ED summons actor Mahesh Babu for questioning on April 27 in money laundering caseActor Mahesh Babu has been summoned by the ED for questioning on April 27 in a money laundering probe. The investigation is linked to Hyderabad-based real estate firms accused of fraudulent land deals and unaccounted cash transactions.

Kesari 2 box office Day 4: Akshay Kumar's film stays steady on first MondayAkshay Kumar's 'Kesari Chapter 2,' co-starring R Madhavan and Ananya Panday, released on April 18 and opened with around Rs 7.75 crore. In just four days of its release, the film has earned Rs 34 crore.

Rajinikanth delights fans, waves at them from moving car at Jailer 2 shoot. WatchSuperstar Rajinikanth is presently shooting for director Nelson Dilipkumar's 'Jailer 2' in Kerala. He made his fans happy as he greeted them with a big smile on his face on the film's shooting spot.

general news.headline: Firing on tourists in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam, 6 injuredGroup of tourists fired upon in Jammu and Kashmir's Pahalgam, police rush to spot
US finalised outline of trade agreement with India: JD Vance in JaipurJD Vance announced that America and India have officially finalised the terms of reference for the trade negotiations.

PM Modi lands in Saudi: Hajj quota, defence and trade pacts on agenda  Live UpdatesPM Modi, who arrived in Saudi Arabia on Tuesday, is expected to discuss Hajj quota for Indians during his meeting with Crown Prince and Prime Minister of Saudi Arabia.

If Thackeray bhais join hands, it'll be for the betas If the Thackeray cousins, Uddhav and Raj, come together after a bitter parting of ways two decades ago, it won't be for themselves but for their sons. This could be the last-ditch attempt for the feuding brothers to reclaim Bal Thackeray's legacy and help Aditya and Amit inherit it.

After new Pope, world to get its first millennial saintCarlo Acutis, a British-Italian teenager, known as God's influencer for coding and creating Christian websites, was slated to be canonised as the first millennial saint on April 27.  With the death of Pope Francis, Acutis' canonisation will have to wait for now. Hundreds of pilgrims have been making a beeline for the Italian town of Assisi every day to his tomb, and offer prayers.

Live: Not here to preach PM Modi like prior US administrations, says JD VanceUS Vice President JD Vance, currently on a four-day official visit to India, met Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday and hailed him as a "great leader". Strengthening bilateral ties between the two democracies is at the heart of Vance's agenda during this high-profile trip. This morning, Vice President Vance arrived in Jaipur, Rajasthan, where he is scheduled to explore the city's rich cultural heritage. He will visit Amber Fort at 9 am on Tuesday, followed by a keynote address on US-India relations at the Rajasthan International Centre (RIC) at 3 pm. The Vice President is staying at the historic Rambagh Palace during his Jaipur leg. Accompanying him on the visit are his wife, Usha Vance, their children, and a delegation of senior officials from the US administration.

PM Modi lands in Jeddah, welcomed with 21-gun salute, to meet Crown PrincePM Modi In Saudi Arabia Live Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi landed in Jeddah on Tuesday for a two-day state visit at the invitation of the Kingdom's Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman. This is PM Modi's third visit to Saudi Arabia over the past decade and the first one to the city of Jeddah. During his visit, PM Modi is expected to discuss the Hajj quota among other issues during his meeting with the Crown Prince and Prime Minister of Saudi Arabia. Stay tuned with indiatoday.in for live updates.

Private training aircraft crashes in Gujarat's Amreli, pilot killed in explosionA training aircraft crashed in Amreli's Shastri Nagar in Gujarat, killing the pilot on board. The crash triggered an explosion, sparking panic.

Saudi's 'Sleeping Prince' turns 36, remains in coma 19 years after crash in LondonPrince Al-Waleed bin Khaled bin Talal, also known as Saudi Arabia's 'Sleeping Prince', turned 36 last week while still in a coma.

Respect for judiciary paramount: Government sources amid rowSenior government officials reaffirmed respect for the judiciary and called for harmony amongst democratic institutions amid ongoing tensions between the executive and judiciary.

Terrorist Happy Passia planned multiple attacks on India, US: FBI chiefFBI chief Kash Patel revealed that terrorist Harpreet Singh, alias Happy Passia, was involved in planning multiple attacks on police stations in India and the US. He said Passia, who was arrested last week, was part of a bigger foreign terrorist gang.

Parliament is supreme: Jagdeep Dhankhar doubles down on criticism of judiciaryVice President Jagdeep Dhankhar doubled down on criticism of judicial 'overreach' and said that "elected representatives will be ultimate masters" of constitution.

Dhai Kilo Ka Haath and handpumps: Sunny Deol punches age in the face at 67Bollywood's OG Sunny Deol is back with another banger, 'Jaat'. In an era where action stunts are more about green screens than grit, Deol storms in at 67 with 'Jaat', reminding everyone what real action looks like.

Pune road rage: Couple beaten with sticks and stones after dispute over honkingThe woman claimed her husband was attacked with sticks and stones and when she tried to intervene, the accused kicked her in the stomach and punched her.

East or West, gold is the bestThe sharp rise in gold prices comes at a time when global markets are under pressure due to the falling US dollar and rising uncertainty in the US economy, especially after recent statements by Donald Trump.

Ramdev to take down Rooh Afza videos after High Court rap on 'sharbat jihad'The Delhi High Court slammed Baba Ramdev for his "sharbat jihad" remark targeting Rooh Afza, calling it "indefensible" and shocking. Following the court's criticism, Patanjali agreed to take down the controversial videos.

MS Dhoni on the most ridiculous rumour about himself: I drink 5 litres of milk dailyIPL 2025: Chennai Super Kings captain MS Dhoni debunked the long-standing rumour that he drinks five litres of milk a day during a fun-filled interaction at a promotional event.

UPSC Civil Services Final Result 2024 declared: Shakti Dubey from Varanasi topsThe UPSC CSE Final Result 2024 has been announced. Shakti Dubey topped the exam, followed by Harshita Goyal and Dongre Archit Parag. A total of 1009 candidates have been recommended for IAS, IPS, IFS and Central Services.

Pope Francis's funeral on Saturday, Vatican releases his photos in open coffinThe Vatican has released the first images of Pope Francis, showing him lying in his casket while the Vatican Secretary of State prays over him. Pope Francis, 88, died on Monday after suffering a stroke and cardiac arrest.

Indian, 20, molests Singapore Airlines cabin crew member pushing her into toiletA 20-year-old Indian national has been charged with allegedly molesting a cabin crew member aboard a Singapore Airlines (SIA) flight. Earlier in April, an Indian-origin retired banker was sentenced to nine months in jail for molesting four SIA cabin crew members.

Despite segment taking hit, this sedan stood tall. Not Amaze, Aura, City, SlaviaThe sedan segment witnessed a decline of 10.27% y-o-y in domestic volumes to 3,41,093 units in FY25 from 3,80,136 units in FY24.
Gold prices are booming, but Dubai's iconic Gold Souk is losing its sparkleThere are signs of change amid rising prices for gold, as buyers look to diamonds and lighter gold jewellery, instead.

Anurag Kashyap apologises to Brahmin community: Forgot dignity due to angerFilmmaker Anurag Kashyap has apologised to the Brahmin community after making controversial remarks. He expressed regret, acknowledging the inappropriateness of his comments.

Commentator Harsha Bhogle breaks silence on missing KKR games amid controversyIPL 2025: Decorated commentator Harsha Bhogle clarified his absence from the broadcast team for Kolkata Knight Riders' home games, dismissing rumours surrounding the matter.

sports.headline: MS Dhoni on the most ridiculous rumour about himself: I drink 5 litres of milk dailyIPL 2025: Chennai Super Kings captain MS Dhoni debunked the long-standing rumour that he drinks five litres of milk a day during a fun-filled interaction at a promotional event.

Vanessa Bryant honors late husband Kobe on what would have been their 24th wedding anniversaryVanessa Bryant paid an emotional tribute to her late husband, NBA legend Kobe Bryant, on what would have marked their 24th wedding anniversary.

CSK don't have the hunger to win, it's their weakest team ever: Suresh RainaIPL 2025: Former Chennai Super KIngs batter Suresh Raina criticised the five-time champions while reflecting on their disastrous run in 2025. Raina questioned why CSK did not tap into local talent pool and lashed out at their lack of intent in the powerplays.

LSG is the team KL Rahul would be wanting to perform against: Cheteshwar PujaraIndia batter Cheteshwar Pujara feels that KL Rahul will be willing to perform against Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) in the upcoming fixture of Delhi Capitals (DC).

NHL: Phillip Danault lifts LA Kings to 6-5 victory over Oilers in Game 1 thrillerPhillip Danault scored his second goal with just 42 seconds left in regulation to give the Los Angeles Kings a dramatic 6-5 win over the Edmonton Oilers in Game 1 of their Western Conference First Round series on Monday night at Crypto.com Arena.

Aussie cricketer gets jail term for domestic violence, walks free due to time servedFormer Australian cricketer Michael Slater was sentenced to four years in prison on charges of domestic violence, stalking and strangulation in relation to multiple incidents involving a woman in Queensland. Slater, however, will walk free after having served more than a year in custody.

Dwayne Bravo continues to defend KKR batters, says they're lacking confidenceKolkata Knight Riders (KKR) mentor Dwayne Bravo defended the team's batters following another shambolic performance against Gujarat Titans. KKR were restricted to 159/8 chasing 199 as they lost the match by 39 runs.

Yuvraj stopped Abhishek from meeting girlfriends and late parties: Yograj SinghLegendary India all-rounder Yuvraj Singh's father Yograj revealed that his son stopped Abhishek Sharma from partying late night and meeting girlfriends to discipline him.

Sai Sudharsan shows T20s can be played in traditional style: Ambati RayuduIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Sai Sudharsan may not be your typical T20 big-hitter, but the elegant Gujarat Titans opener is reaping rewards for his consistency. He grabbed the Orange Cap on Monday with a match-winning fifty in Kolkata.

Mayank Yadav is fit, management will take a call on his selection: Yuvraj ChaudharyLucknow Super Giants (LSG) all-rounder Yuvraj Chaudhary has revealed that fast bowler Mayank Yadav is fit and captain Rishabh Pant and head coach Justin Langer will take a call on his selection against Delhi Capitals.

IPL 2025: KL Rahul helping plot plans against LSG, reveals Vipraj Nigram DC's Vipraj Nigam admitted that the team is tapping into KL Rahul's knowledge about the LSG squad ahead of their game on Tuesday, April 22. Rahul captained LSG for three seasons before joining DC.

He grabbed the Orange Cap on Monday with a match-winning fifty in Kolkata.

IPL 2025: KL Rahul helping plot plans against LSG, reveals Vipraj Nigram DC's Vipraj Nigam admitted that the team is tapping into KL Rahul's knowledge about the LSG squad ahead of their game on Tuesday, April 22. Rahul captained LSG for three seasons before joining DC.

LSG vs DC: Delhi take on feisty Lucknow to rebuild winning momentumIPL 2025, LSG vs DC Prediction: Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) will host Delhi Capitals (DC) in Match 40 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025), where both teams will have a golden chance to climb higher on the points table.

Commentator Harsha Bhogle breaks silence on missing KKR games amid controversyIPL 2025: Decorated commentator Harsha Bhogle clarified his absence from the broadcast team for Kolkata Knight Riders' home games, dismissing rumours surrounding the matter.

IPL 2025: Rajasthan Royals face match fixing allegations after shocking loss vs LSGIndian Premier League franchise Rajasthan Royals (RR) have found themselves in a controversy following their shocking loss against Lucknow Super Giants. Rajasthan Cricket Association (RCA) ad hoc committee convener has alleged that the team was involved in match fixing.

LSG vs DC: Revitalised KL Rahul out to hurt his former franchise LucknowAfter an unceremonious exit from LSG, KL Rahul returns to his former stomping ground, revitalised and with a point to prove. Will Rahul come back to haunt his former team, this time in the colours of DC?

Steve Waugh on Rohit's future as Test captain: Can't be complacent or relaxedLegendary Australia captain Steve Waugh has shared his thoughts on Rohit Sharma's future in the Indian Test team and said that the India skipper needs to ask himself if he has the hunger and desire to play the longest format.

Anaya Bangar chills with Sarfaraz Khan and his father, Musheer misses reunionFormer Indian cricketer Sanjay Bangar's child Anaya Bangar spent time with Sarfaraz Khan and his family, and posted pictures featuring some precious moments with them.

KKR vs GT: Kolkata need to rethink overrated tactics to mount IPL 2025 comebackIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Anil Kumble and Mark Boucher were critical of Kolkata's tactic of tinkering with their batting lineup after the 39-run defeat to the Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata.

LSG vs DC: Revitalised KL Rahul out to hurt his former franchise LucknowAfter an unceremonious exit from LSG, KL Rahul returns to his former stomping ground, revitalised and with a point to prove. Will Rahul come back to haunt his former team, this time in the colours of DC?

Shubman, Sai and Buttler made pitch look easy during their batting: Sai KishoreGujarat Titans (GT) spinner Sai Kishore credited captain Shubman Gill, Sai Sudharsan and Jos Buttler for making the pitch look easy during their batting against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR). GT beat KKR by 39 runs at Eden Gardens.

Rashid Khan's return to form has lifted the morale of Gujarat Titans: Sai KishoreIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: In the post-match press conference, Sai Kishore praised Rashid Khan after the Afghan leg-spinner returned to form with figures of 4-0-25-2 against the Kolkata Knight Riders.

Is leg-spin Andre Russell's kryptonite in IPL? KKR mentor Dwayne Bravo respondsKKR mentor Dwayne Bravo doesn't feel that leg-spin is Andre Russell's weakness in the IPL after their loss to GT. Russell was dismissed by Rashid Khan during the game at the Eden Gardens.

Mondo Duplantis 2nd track and field star after Usain Bolt to win Laureus top honourPole Vault star Mondo Duplantis became the second track and field athlete after Usain Bolt to win the Laureus Sportsman Of The Year award on Monday, April 21. Apart from Duplantis, Simone Biles and Lamine Yamal were also honoured.

KKR captain Rahane blames Narine, Gurbaz after meek surrender vs GujaratKolkata Knight Riders captain Ajinkya Rahane blamed openers Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Sunil Narine for the team's loss against Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens. Rahane asked his players to be brave from the next game.

14 runs off 19 balls in 199 chase: KKR fans slam Venkatesh IyerVenkatesh Iyer caught the ire of Kolkata Knight Riders' fans after a horror show with the bat against Gujarat Titans at the Eden Gardens. Iyer scored 14 off 19 balls in 199 chase.

Clinical Gujarat hammer hapless Kolkata to tighten grip on top spotIPL 2025, KKR vs GT: Shubman Gill's Gujarat Titans beat Ajinkya Rahane's Kolkata Knight Riders by 39 runs at the Eden Gardens to secure their sixth win of the competition and strengthened their grip on the top of the points table.

Bhogle, Doull axed from commentary duties for KKR tie over curator remark: ReportPopular commentators Harsha Bhogle and Simon Doull were absent from KKR's home game against Gujarat Titans on Monday, April 21. Bhogle and Doull were involved in a controversy with Eden curator Sujan Mukherjee at the start of the season.

Unlucky 90s: Shubman Gill matches Virat Kohli in wanted IPL recordGujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill got dismissed on 90 while playing against Kolkata on Monday, April 21. This was the second time that Gill was dismissed in his 90s.

Consider myself as an all-rounder for DC: Vipraj Nigam on his role in DelhiVipraj Nigam has said that he sees himself as an all-rounder for Delhi Capitals this season and wants to contribute with bat and ball for the team. Vipraj has been a star for DC this season, especially with the ball.
Devon Conway's father dies, CSK post heartfelt messageChennai Super Kings posted a heartfelt message for Devon Conway's father, Denton, who passed away. Conway has not played for CSK since April 11.

NFL Draft 2025: Date, time, rankings, predictions and all you need to knowThe 2025 NFL Draft will open the opportunity for teams to select top young talent for the upcoming season. The event is scheduled for Thursday, April 24 at Lambeau Field in Green Bay, Wisconsin.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
